#define MAL_S3_VECTOR_CROSS_PRODUCT ( res,
v1,
v2   ) 
Value:
{ res[0] = v1[1]*v2[2]-v1[2]*v2[1];   \
    res[1] = v1[2]*v2[0]-v1[0]*v2[2];   \
    res[2] = v1[0]*v2[1]-v1[1]*v2[0];}
